snippet: Learning the basic ecology of two quail species is needed to understand what divides the species, and what factors may bring them together.
abstract: Learning the basic ecology of two quail species is needed to understand what divides the species, and what factors may bring them together.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Gee, a biologist at the Claremont University Consortium and the University of California, Riverside, writes from the tropical dry forest near Álamos, Mexico, where she and Jennifer Calkins are studying Callipepla quail.
